mapper.select:
SELECT DEPT_CD AS CODE , DEPT_CD ||'('|| DEPT_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_DEPARTMENT WHERE 1=1 AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND (DEPT_CD LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%' OR DEPT_NM LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%')
ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT MM.MENU_ID AS CODE , MM.MENU_ID ||'('|| MM.MENU_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_DIVISION_MENU MDM , MOM_MENU MM WHERE MDM.MENU_ID = MM.MENU_ID AND MDM.COMPANY_CD = 'CALCES' AND MDM.DIVISION_CD = 'DEV1' AND MDM.MENU_ID <> 'root' AND MM.MENU_TYPE = 'P' ORDER BY MM.MENU_ID,MM.MENU_NM
SELECT TEMPLATE_ID AS CODE , TEMPLATE_ID ||'('|| TEMPLATE_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_GRID_TEMPLATE ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT CODE_CATEGORY AS CODE , CODE_CATEGORY ||'('|| CODE_CATEGORY_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_CODE_CATEGORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT GROUP_CD AS CODE , GROUP_CD ||'('|| GROUP_CODE_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_GROUP_CODE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT UNIT AS CODE , UNIT ||'('|| UNIT_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_UNIT WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT B.TABLE_NAME AS CODE , B.TABLE_NAME ||'('|| B.COMMENTS ||')' AS LABEL FROM ALL_OBJECTS A , ALL_TAB_COMMENTS B WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = 'TABLE' AND B.OWNER = A.OWNER AND B.TABLE_NAME = A.OBJECT_NAME AND B.OWNER = 'MOM_MASTER' ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT MAM.MENU_ID AS CODE , NVL((SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_MULTI_LANGUAGE( MAM.COMPANY_CD , MAM.DIVISION_CD , #{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , 'MENU' , MAM.PARENT_MENU_ID) FROM DUAL ),MAM.MENU_NM ) || '-' || MENU_NM AS LABEL FROM MOM_AUTH_MENU_V MAM WHERE MAM.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MAM.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MAM.AUTH_GROUP_CD = #{authGroupCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MAM.MENU_TYPE = 'P' AND (UPPER(MAM.MENU_NM) LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{searchText, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%' ) ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT PLANT_CD AS CODE , PLANT_CD ||'('|| PLANT_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_PLANT WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT PARTNER_CD AS CODE , PARTNER_CD ||'('|| PARTNER_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_PARTNER WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND (TRIM(UPPER(PARTNER_CD)) LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%' OR TRIM(UPPER(PARTNER_NM)) LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%')
ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT ITEM_ID AS CODE , ITEM_ID ||'('|| ITEM_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_ITEM WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND ( UPPER(ITEM_ID) LIKE '%' || UPPER(TRIM(#{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%' ))
ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT WORK_GROUP_CD AS CODE , WORK_GROUP_CD ||'('|| WORK_GROUP_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_WORK_GROUP WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT OPERATION_ID AS CODE , OPERATION_ID ||'('|| OPERATION_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_OPERATION WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT ROUTING_ID AS CODE , ROUTING_ID ||'('|| ROUTING_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_ROUTING WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND (ROUTING_ID LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%' OR ROUTING_NM LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#{searchKey, jdbcType=VARCHAR})) || '%')
ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT IL_TYPE AS CODE , IL_TYPE ||'('|| IL_TYPE_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_IL_CATEGORY WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT PO_TYPE AS CODE , PO_TYPE ||'('|| PO_TYPE_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_PO_CATEGORY WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT SO_TYPE AS CODE , SO_TYPE ||'('|| SO_TYPE_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_SO_CATEGORY WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT REST_TIME_CD AS CODE , REST_TIME_CD ||'('|| REST_TIME_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_SHIFT_REST_TIME WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT SHIFT_CD AS CODE , SHIFT_CD ||'('|| SHIFT_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_SHIFT WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY LABEL

SELECT ID_GEN_CD AS CODE , ID_GEN_CD ||'('|| ID_GEN_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_ID_GENERATE WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY ID_GEN_NM

SELECT USER_NO AS CODE , USER_NO ||'('|| USER_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_USER WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY USER_NM

SELECT MUI.USER_NO AS CODE , MUI.USER_NO ||'('|| MU.USER_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_USER_ITEM_TYPE_REL MUI , MOM_USER MU WHERE MUI.COMPANY_CD = MU.COMPANY_CD AND MUI.DIVISION_CD = MU.DIVISION_CD AND MUI.USER_NO = MU.USER_NO AND MUI.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MUI.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MUI.CATEGORY = #{category, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MUI.ITEM_TYPE = NVL(#{itemType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} , MUI.ITEM_TYPE) AND MUI.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY MU.USER_NM

SELECT MPC.PO_TYPE AS CODE , MPC.PO_TYPE ||'('|| MPC.PO_TYPE_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_PO_CATEGORY MPC WHERE MPC.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPC.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MPC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND EXISTS ( SELECT '*' FROM MOM_IO_CATEGORY MIC WHERE MIC.COMPANY_CD = MPC.COMPANY_CD AND MIC.DIVISION_CD = MPC.DIVISION_CD AND MIC.IO_TYPE = MPC.IO_TYPE AND MIC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MIC.PUR_RETURN_YN = 'Y' ) ORDER BY MPC.PO_TYPE_NM

SELECT IDENTIFICATION_STOCK_ID AS CODE , IDENTIFICATION_STOCK_ID ||'('|| IDENTIFICATION_STOCK_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_IDENTIFICATION_STOCK WHERE COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY IDENTIFICATION_STOCK_NM

SELECT TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MC.DATE_ID, 'MONTH'), 'YYYYMM') CODE , TO_CHAR(TRUNC(MC.DATE_ID, 'MONTH'), 'YYYY-MM') LABEL FROM MOM_CALENDAR MC WHERE 1 =1
AND MC.DATE_ID <= MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_LOCAL_TIME(#{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
GROUP BY TRUNC(MC.DATE_ID, 'MONTH') ORDER BY 1 DESC

SELECT CODE , NVL((SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_MULTI_LANGUAGE(#{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'CODE',#{groupCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}|| '_' ||CODE) FROM DUAL ),CODE ||'('|| CODE_NM ||')') AS LABEL FROM MOM_CODE WHERE DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND GROUP_CD = 'MD0001' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND UPPER(CODE) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{itemGroupCd , jdbcType=VARCHAR}) || '%'
ORDER BY SORT_NO,LABEL

SELECT MU.USER_NO AS CODE , MU.USER_NO ||'('|| MU.USER_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_DEPARTMENT MD , MOM_USER MU WHERE MD.COMPANY_CD = MU.COMPANY_CD AND MD.DIVISION_CD = MU.DIVISION_CD AND MD.DEPT_CD = MU.DEPT_CD AND MD.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MD.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MD.PO_RECEIPT_YN = 'Y' AND MD.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MU.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY MU.USER_NM

SELECT MUM.WAREHOUSE_CD AS CODE , MUM.WAREHOUSE_CD ||'('|| MWH.WAREHOUSE_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM MOM_USER_WH_IO_RECEIPT_MAP MUM , MOM_WAREHOUSE MWH WHERE MUM.COMPANY_CD = MWH.COMPANY_CD AND MUM.DIVISION_CD = MWH.DIVISION_CD AND MUM.WAREHOUSE_CD = MWH.WAREHOUSE_CD AND MUM.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MWH.USE_YN = 'Y' AND MUM.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MUM.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MUM.USER_NO = #{userId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MUM.IO_RECEIPT_TYPE = #{ioReceiptType, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY MWH.WAREHOUSE_NM

SELECT CODE , NVL((SELECT MOM_COMMON_PKG.FN_GET_MULTI_LANGUAGE(#{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{langCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'CODE',#{groupCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR}|| '_' ||CODE) FROM DUAL ),CODE ||'('|| CODE_NM ||')') AS LABEL FROM MOM_CODE WHERE DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND GROUP_CD = 'MD0020' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
AND ATTRIBUTE1 = 'Y'
ORDER BY SORT_NO,LABEL

SELECT LOCATION_CD AS CODE , LOCATION_CD ||'('|| LOCATION_NM ||')' AS LABEL FROM ( SELECT ML.LOCATION_CD , ML.LOCATION_NM , 0 AS SORT_NO FROM MOM_LOCATION ML WHERE ML.COMPANY_CD = #{companyCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ML.DIVISION_CD = #{divisionCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) ORDER BY SORT_NO , LOCATION_CD
